ModMetaData.name: No Shadows (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of winggars mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1780338926
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emipa606/RimWorld-Wrapper/master/Notice.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/NoShadows
--- Original Description --- This mod removes the shadows that walls cast. This might increase performance, but I haven't yet tested it myself.
This was a request from Rafaelkb on Ludeon Forums.
No Shadows is an XML mod, so it should be compatible with everything, including multiplayer.
